ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:49:03 [Issue ID 4000-331362] urn:comicvine:4000-331362 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:14:45. [Issue ID 942023]
ComicInfo.Summary: After five years, Devon Massey returns to Amryl Entertainment with this brand new mini-series, Cavewoman: Mutation, plus a 4-page preview story by Budd Root, his first story artwork in over two years to see print! When a rafting expedition down a primordial river takes a turn for the worst, Meriem, Bruce, and Professor Cook must lead the shattered survivors through a bizarre swamp valley, bristling with mutated dinosaurs and danger around every corner. Can Cavewoman save the crew from these creatures and each other? And what has fallen out of the sky to cause this madness? And as a special bonus, Budd Root presents a 4 page preview of his epic Werewolf story that has been in the works for the past 4-plus years!
ComicInfo.Title: Hunting Party
